law.catch_line: An organization is disqualified from obtaining a license under this subtitle for 1 year if the organ...
law.text:
An organization is disqualified from obtaining a license under this subtitle for 1 year if the organization fails to:
file the report required under § 13-2109 of this subtitle; or
comply with §§ 13-2103 through 13-2110 of this subtitle.
